mapper.sql: id, police_id, index_num, bureau_rule_score, visit_score, traffic_violation_score, creation_date, update_date
mapper.insert: insert into risk_conduct (id, police_id, index_num, bureau_rule_score, visit_score, traffic_violation_score, creation_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{policeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bureauRuleScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{visitScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trafficViolationScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update risk_conduct
police_id = #{policeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
index_num = #{indexNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bureau_rule_score = #{bureauRuleScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
visit_score = #{visitScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
traffic_violation_score = #{trafficViolationScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update risk_conduct set police_id = #{policeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, index_num = #{indexNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bureau_rule_score = #{bureauRuleScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, visit_score = #{visitScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, traffic_violation_score = #{trafficViolationScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from risk_conduct where police_id = #{policeId} and DATE_FORMAT(creation_date, '%Y-%m') = #{dateTime}
